description:
When the world falls into a strange dimension...

When a misterious entity is chasing you...

Can you find The Way?

0101001 is an horror game, you are stuck in a strange dimension created by a misterious entity, the way to "freedom" is to find the way, which can be accessed by collecting 10 crystals. however the same entity that forced you in this dimension is trying to block you from finding help.

What will happen, What will you find and How will you Survive

-Controls-

W,A,S,D, to Move

Shift to Run

Mouse to see around
